TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XpsDocument extends System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsPartBase implements class System.IDisposable
Public Class XpsDocument Inherits XpsPartBase Implements IDisposable

summary.span: 提供存放 XPS 文件之內容的 。

span.span: Provides a that holds the content of an XPS document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含，包含一或多個項目。An contains a that comprises one or more elements. 的參考傳遞給建構函式用於撰寫、 儲存及讀取文件的內容項目。The constructor is passed a reference to a for writing, storing, and reading the content elements of the document. 新的空白[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]建立使用建構函式。A new empty [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] is created by using the constructor. 現有[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]開啟使用方法。An existing [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] is opened by using the method. A根加入空[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]藉由呼叫方法。A root is added to an empty [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] by calling the method. 印表機資訊與控制的項目也會與相關聯，或個別和中儲存的項目。 elements with printer information and control can also be associated with the , or on individual and elements that are stored in the . 如需有關[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]看到 XML Paper Specification (XPS) 下載[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761)。For more information about [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] see the XML Paper Specification (XPS) available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).

summary.span: 關閉 XPS 文件 。

span.span: Closes the XPS document .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已針對寫入存取，資料的緩衝區寫入存放區和實體的文件開啟已關閉。If the was opened for write access, data buffers are written to the store and the physical document is closed. 之後已呼叫，文件的任何部分使用可以存取這執行個體。After has been called, no parts of the document can be accessed with this instance. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何開啟、 插入內容，並關閉。The following example shows how to open, insert content, and close an . MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the and optionally, releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 當`disposing`參數為 true，這個方法的任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個參考。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources that are held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以呼叫其他物件多次。

span.span: Other objects can call multiple times.

para.span: 當您覆寫，請小心不要參考到所要的早期呼叫中先前處置的物件。

span.span: When you override , be careful not to reference objects that were previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需有關如何實作，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 如需有關和，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

param.name: certificate

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`certificate`是`null`，會出現一個對話方塊，可讓使用者選取已安裝的 X.509 憑證，例如，從智慧卡讀卡機。If `certificate` is `null`, a dialog box appears that enables the user to select an installed X.509 certificate, such as from a smart card reader. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何使用 方法。The following example shows how to use the method.
